nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: textarea
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: London would not surrender. All the people of London were in the front lines. They put out endless fires from the heavy bombing. They dug quickly in cellars to rescue their friends who had been buried underneath the wreckage. London people prepared to fight on with every possible means until the last Englishman died or the invaders were driven off.
